title: Game running in slow motion
body:
So I just downloaded the recent patch and I go into a normal game and my game is going in slow motion.
Sounds are playing at normal speed, my bullets as jinx are going normal speed but all movement apart from them are in slow motion.
My game is running at 93 fps which is very strange as it normally runs on a smooth 60 on very high and my ping is 83 which is normal, so i check to see my computer if anything is taking up the memory i close everything else and check memory usage yet all is normal.
So I try reducing the game to normal graphics settings, no change.
Tried closing the game down and reconnecting, no change.

Anyone else experiencing this/know what could be causing it apart from rito patches?
